name: DEERSKULL
description:
Made for Carnaval Game Jam

You have a skull for a mask, you can control blood with your mind, the streets are filled with hostiles. Time to get to work.

How to play:

Move around - A and D

Jump - Space

Throw skull - Left Mouse Button

Attract blood - Right Mouse Button

Advance dialogue - E

Restart Level - R

Main Menu - Esc

Credits:

Art and Programming -  @moraguma

Music - @playwrightsband

Bulky Pixels font - Smoking Drum

Boo City font - Tyler Finck

Thank you for playing! Feel free to talk to me on twitter if you wanna give some feedback. I really appreciate it!
